diff_act: 1.replace the user with a Computer Opponent
2.update all connected clients about the change

regen.absent_element: action to replace departed user with a Computer Opponent when user departs early
regen.new_specification: The system shall replace the departed user with a Computer Opponent when the user leaves the game early.

label: If a user leaves the game prematurely, a new CO is created to fill their place.
absence: creation of a new CO to fill the place of a user leaving the game prematurely
